cgcloud__Data_Type_Option__c.name: cgcloud__Data_Type_Option__c
cgcloud__Data_Type_Option__c.description: Stores the item (picklist item) of a flexible data type.

cgcloud__Code_Uniqueness_Check__c.description: This field is used internally to ensure that one code (field) is unique within a data type record. The value is set via workflow. It shouldn't be shown to the user.

cgcloud__Code__c.description: Code or value of the data type option.

cgcloud__Default_Item__c.description: Indicates whether the item is a default item.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__ImageId__c.description: Name of the picture on the mobility device.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Stores the hyperlink of the record.

cgcloud__Unique_Default_Option__c.description: This field is used internal to ensure that only one option can be set as default within a data type record. The value would be set via workflow. It should not be shown to the user.
